channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Where Will New Data Center Power Be? And How Will It Work?
item.description: Multi-gigawatt data centers need self-supply, grid backups, revolution.

item.title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy announces departure of AI exec Rohit Prasad in leadership shakeup
item.description: Prasad's exit comes after Amazon struggled to show its internal AI efforts could match those of rivals—and just as reports surface that Amazon is disc...

item.title: FDA announces recall of frozen dessert pints over possible 'small stones'
item.description: The FDA announced a voluntary recall of non-dairy frozen dessert pints sold at stores nationwide over the potential presence of small stones.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X Is Fighting A New Social Media War Over The Twitter Brand
item.description: The issue is over copyright and legal usage, but the story could be far more important from a branding standpoint.

item.title: Why Maintaining A Healthy Weight Isn’t The Same For Everyone
item.description: Obesity is not a single disease. New research shows distinct biological phenotypes that explain why weight gain and treatment response vary so widely.

item.title: Ray Dalio donates $75 million to ‘Trump Accounts’ as Scott Bessent leads ‘50 State Challenge’ to invest in America’s kids
item.description: "At an early age I was exposed to the stock market, and it changed my life,” the billionaire said in a statement.

item.title: Experts say Amazon is playing the long game with its potential $10 billion OpenAI deal: ‘ChatGPT is still seen as the Kleenex of AI’
item.description: “If OpenAI wins the lottery, then they’d have the money to pay for this,” analyst Charles Fitzgerald said.

item.title: A U.S. oil blockade on Venezuela could ‘devastate’ its economy and further pressure Maduro. But how far is Trump willing to take it?
item.description: Questions abound about whether the White House will add new sanctions to oil tankers trekking to Venezuela and how broad the oil blockade will become.

item.title: PayPal plans to launch bank serving small businesses around the US
item.description: PayPal files with Utah and the FDIC to launch PayPal Bank, an industrial loan company offering small business lending and FDIC-insured savings account...

item.title: The Most Martian Desert On Earth: The Atacama Desert In Northern Chile
item.description: As the oldest and driest desert on Earth, Chile's Atacama Desert is a treasure trove of discoveries for scientists and tourists alike.

item.title: Musk predicts AI will create 'universal high income' and make saving money unnecessary
item.description: Elon Musk dismisses Trump savings accounts, claiming AI will create "universal high income" and eliminate poverty, making saving unnecessary.

item.title: Bezos Overtakes Ellison As World’s Third-Richest Person As Oracle Shares Tumble
item.description: Oracle has suffered recently as investors intensify worries about its central role in a potential AI bubble.

item.title: Legally assisted suicide to become law in New York State
item.description: “I was taught that God is merciful and compassionate, and so must we be,” Gov. Kathy Hochul wrote in an op-ed.

item.title: Nasdaq sharply lower in final hour as tech sells off; Dow, S&P also down — live
Micron earnings blow past expectations — and the stock is climbing
Here's why Nvidia, Broadcom and other AI stocks are falling sharply today
Dow, S&P 500 end lower for 4th straight day, as tech drags Nasdaq down sharply
10 of the most loved dividend stocks for 2026
Scott Bessent says real affordability relief, 'substantial drop' in inflation coming soon
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent predicts inflation relief and tax refunds for Americans in 2026, forecasting a "bountiful" economic year ahead for Ma...

item.title: iRobot co-founder says FTC's opposition to Amazon deal was 'wrong-minded' following bankruptcy filing
item.description: iRobot filed for bankruptcy and will be bought by Chinese manufacturer after Amazon's $1.4 billion acquisition was blocked by the FTC on antitrust gro...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
